text:
Hi everyone!

We are HubSpot Developers (we develop email templates and themes for the Marketplace), and we are interested in presenting our theme in a nicer way with our own branded domain.

However, it costs around $800 USD per month to do so, and at this moment we canâ€™t justify the cost.

Do you know if HubSpot offers some kind of coupon for this, or similar, so we can do this as HubSpot developers?

Thank you

Hi All, we are working with a software development client who want to list their app on the HubSpot app marketplace. Their product is high annual contract value and therefore has a slower sales cycle. Is there a way for them to list on the marketplace without 3 active customer installs. Looking for guidance and help over with matter. Happy to provide more specifics over DM
